comments.body: Don't we also need to remove the `#` in the beginning of these lines?

The file is currently disabled, which I'm not aiming to reverse. I'm just fixing up the file syntax in case we end up re-enabling it in the future.

I did the same for the models repo, which has a CODEOWNERS file that's actively being used: https://github.com/tensorflow/models/pull/3016

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@# Where component owners are known, add them here.

# /tensorflow/core/platform/windows/ @mrry
# /tensorflow/java/ @asimshankar
# /tensorflow/tensorboard/ @jart @dandelionmane
